name: Lien attaches to personalty in possession
text:
Sections 201G-76 and 201G-77 shall also apply to any personal property which, before May 2, 1949, was left in or about any public housing project, and was taken into the possession of the corporation, as herein set forth and provided. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 120, §17]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  Sections 201G-76 and 201G-77 shall also apply to any personal property which, before May 2, 1949, was left in or about any public housing project, and was taken into the possession of the administration, as herein set forth and provided. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 120, §17 and c 196, §26(a)]
